questions: Artificial kidney is a device to remove nitrogenous waste products from the blood through dialysis. In case of kidney failure, an artificial kidney can be used. In the process, blood of the patient is allowed to pass through the long cellulose tubes dipped in a tank containing dialysing solution having same ionic concentration as plasma.
